title: What Are Aquarius’ Lucky Colors? Plus, How to Use Them

steps.title: Electric blue
steps.content: Electric blue Vibrant deep blues like ultramarine and striking light blues like cyan are Aquarius’ power colors. [1] X Research source Electric blue represents intelligence, creativity, and individuality, perfectly capturing your innovative and eccentric personality. This hue boosts your ability to think outside of the box , helping you take new perspectives and come up with exciting ideas. [2] X Research source Electric blue is also a calming color for Aquarius. It helps you calm your racing mind, focus your thoughts , and think of creative solutions to problems. Blue is also associated with Uranus, the planet of innovation and originality, which rules over Aquarius. This hue inspires you to grow and be true to yourself. Aquarius’ symbol is the water bearer, so it’s no surprise that electric blue enhances your unique traits!

steps.title: Turquoise
steps.content: Turquoise Blue greens like turquoise, aqua, and teal symbolize creativity, inspiration, and communication. These ocean shades spark Aquarius’ humanitarian spirit, motivating you to find innovative ways to make the world a better place. Turquoise also brings you mental clarity, helping you feel less stressed and more capable of enacting positive change. [3] X Research source Turquoise is healing for Aquarius, too. It can help you connect with other people and feel mentally, physically, and spiritually in balance.

steps.title: White
steps.content: White As an air sign, white reflects Aquarius’ curious and independent nature. This hue represents purity, open-mindedness, and new beginnings. It helps you free your mind , look at the world in new ways, and seize all of the wonderful opportunities around you. [4] X Research source White can also fuel your creativity. Like a blank canvas full of possibilities, white ignites your imagination and helps you generate ideas. This hue also represents balance and stability, which speaks to Aquarius’ fixed nature. It helps you persevere through challenges and stay determined to achieve your goals .

steps.title: Purple
steps.content: Purple Purple symbolizes spirituality, imagination, and magic. It helps youconnect with your spiritual side and introspect, amplifying your intuition and awareness. This color also enhances your mystical vibes, giving you the confidence to stand out from the crowd and embrace your authentic self . [5] X Research source Plus, if your birthday is in February, amethyst is your birthstone, which is a beautiful purple color.

steps.title: Incorporate Aquarius’ lucky colors in your wardrobe.
steps.content: Incorporate Aquarius’ lucky colors in your wardrobe. To amplify your luck and feel like the best version of yourself, wear electric blue shirts, pants, skirts, and dresses. For a boost in creativity and communication, put on turquoise clothes. Or, feel inspired and imaginative by wearing white or purple. [6] X Research source Pair together outfits that use your colors. For instance: Wear blue jeans and a purple top for focus, wisdom, peace, and intuition. Put on turquoise pants and a white shirt for creativity, inspiration, and mental clarity.

steps.title: Put on accessories in Aquarius’ color palette.
steps.content: Put on accessories in Aquarius’ color palette. Add pops of color to your outfit to stand out from the crowd and strengthen your Aquarian traits. For instance, wear an electric blue coat , put on turquoise boots, tie on a purple scarf , or don a white bucket hat. Wear all kinds of accessories in your lucky colors, like belts, bags, sunglasses, and jewelry. Show off your originality and free spirit with makeup, too. For example, put on blue eyeliner or turquoise eyeshadow and paint your nails purple.

steps.title: Decorate your space in your lucky colors.
steps.content: Decorate your space in your lucky colors. Feel balanced and peaceful at home by painting your walls blue, turquoise, white, or purple. Add furniture and decorations in your colors, like chairs, rugs, curtains, pillows, and artwork. [7] X Research source Decorating your workspace with your colors can help you feel motivated and creative, too.

steps.title: Wear or use crystals in Aquarius’ colors.
steps.content: Wear or use crystals in Aquarius’ colors. Using crystals in Aquarius’ colors is believed to further heighten your traits and promote healing. For instance, wear lapis lazuli jewelry or place a gem in your home to enhance your wisdom and mental clarity. [8] X Research source Or, put on aquamarine jewelry or carry a crystal with you to help you communicate and express yourself. [9] X Research source Wear and decorate with other crystals for Aquarius, like: Amethyst , which promotes focus, intuition, and purification. Turquoise , which brings peace, good luck, and emotional healing. Moonstone , which boosts protection, awareness, and focus. Amazonite , which inspires confidence, courage, and communication. Use these crystals in your spiritual practice, too. For instance, hold a gem as you meditate or place it on a table or altar as you pray or manifest.

steps.title: Pursue hobbies and activities that use your lucky colors.
steps.content: Pursue hobbies and activities that use your lucky colors. Aquarius is a quirky and creative sign, so you probably already have some interesting hobbies! Work with your colors as you take part in your pastimes, like painting in blues and turquoises, making purple jewelry, or crafting white clay pieces. Choose accessories for your hobbies that match your lucky colors, too. For instance, wear turquoise boxing gloves, garden with an electric blue watering can, or wrap your gaming console in a purple cover.

steps.title: Brown
steps.content: Brown Earthy colors like brown can weigh down Aquarius’ airy nature. Wearing or decorating with brown can make you feel restricted, uncreative, and uninspired. [10] X Research source Don’t feel like you need to completely avoid brown. While there are some colors that might be more unlucky than others for Aquarius, it’s okay to use them in moderation.

steps.title: Mossy green
steps.content: Mossy green Muted greens are also associated with practical earth signs, which puts these colors at odds with Aquarius’ inventive spirit and need for freedom. Green can also make you feel jealous or possessive, which clashes with your accepting and open-minded personality. [11] X Research source

steps.title: Red
steps.content: Red Bold and passionate red can be too much for Aquarius’ relaxed, and often aloof, nature. This might throw you out of balance and make you feel uncharacteristically out of control. [12] X Research source

steps.title: Aquarians are independent, intellectual, and humanitarian.
steps.content: Aquarians are independent, intellectual, and humanitarian. With their unconventional style and eccentric interests, no two Aquarians are quite the same ! This sign embraces their quirks and confidently marches to the beat of their own drum. They use their sharp intellect and creative mind to promote progress and make the world a better place. [13] X Research source Dates : January 20 to February 18 Element : Air Modality : Fixed Symbol : The water bearer Planetary ruler : Uranus and Saturn Birthstone : Garnet (January) and amethyst (February) Flower : Orchid Lucky numbers : 2, 3, 4, 7, 9, 13 Lucky days : Thursday and Friday Famous Aquarians : Megan Thee Stallion, Harry Styles, Oprah Winfrey, Michael B. Jordan, Ed Sheeran, Shakira, Cristiano Ronaldo, Elizabeth Olsen, The Weeknd

steps.title: Every zodiac sign has a power color that amplifies their personality.
steps.content: Every zodiac sign has a power color that amplifies their personality. Each of the 12 signs has a lucky color that represents their positive traits, element, modality, and planetary ruler. [14] X Research source Aries : Red Taurus : Green Gemini : Yellow Cancer : Silver Leo : Orange and gold Virgo : Green and brown Libra : Pink Scorpio : Black Sagittarius : Purple Capricorn : Gray Pisces : Light Green
